      • getDoubleValue

        public java.lang.Double getDoubleValue(java.lang.String paramname)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Get property by name. The value of the property must be a double value.

        Format:
              Double value.
        Example:
              <entry key="PARAMNAME">1230.0</entry>

        Parameters:
        paramname - Name of the property.
        Returns:
        the value of the property: a double value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the property could not be found or if the value could not be converted to a double value.

      • getDoubleArray

        public double[] getDoubleArray(java.lang.String paramname)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Get property by name. The value of the property must be a double array.

        Format:
        The double values must be separated by ',' or ' '. After the last element
        of the array, a ';' can terminate the array.
        Example:
        <entry key="PARAMNAME">1.1, 2.3, 1.2;</entry>

        Parameters:
        paramname - Name of the property.
        Returns:
        the value of the property: a double array.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the property could not be found or if the value could not be converted to a double array.

      • getDoubleMatrix

        public double[][] getDoubleMatrix(java.lang.String paramname)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Get property by name. The value of the property must be a double matrix.

        Format:
              The values of a row must be separated by ',' or ' '. At the end
              of each row, a ';' occurs.
        Example:
              <entry key="PARAMNAME">
                   1.1, 2.3, 1.2;
                   7.2, 5.3, 9.8;
              </entry>

        Parameters:
        paramname - Name of the property.
        Returns:
        the value of the property: a matrix of doubles. The first index of the matrix indicates the row, the second the column: Matrix[row][column].
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the property could not be found or if the value could not be converted to a double matrix.

      • stringToDoubleMatrix

        private double[][] stringToDoubleMatrix(java.lang.String valstr)

      • getMaterial

        public Material getMaterial(java.lang.String paramname)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Get property by name. The value of the property must be a material name.

        Format:
              fluid name.
        Example:
              <entry key="PARAMNAME">Water</entry>

        Parameters:
        paramname - Name of the property.
        Returns:
        the material object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the property could not be found or if the value could not be converted to a double value.
